title: Last resort
creator_credit: Robert Scarfe and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: An insight into the role and function of the Victorian Ombudsman through the dramatization of actual cases investigated by the Office. Includes an interview with the Ombudsman.
